attributes.action: Ban drivers from refusing school children on bus for lost or damaged Oyster card
attributes.background: I have witnessed teenage school children being refused to board the bus many times because they lost their Oyster card or it is damaged. I have changed my own children's Oyster card more than10 times for being lost or stopped working all of the sudden. Refusing them can put them in danger sometimes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
